body:
Comment 4: 
I still don't know why you are seeing those errors testing the runtime package, but I'm
fairly confident that they are fixed on tip.

I don't understand the syscall failure.  Does qemu not implement the getrlimit system
call?  You can run "go test -c syscall" to get a test program you can run.  You can run
that under strace to see what happens with the getrlimit syscall.
